lead_paragraph: FELDMAN--Elaine Kram. Born December 24, 1928 in Manhattan, died suddenly in her home in Mill Neck, NY January 15, 2016. Raised in Manhattan, attended Ethical Culture Fieldston School, graduated from Adelphi University. Worked for WNEW, Harper's Bazaar, eventually working in real estate sales. A beloved mother, wife, lover of animals, she's survived by her devoted husband of 60 years Dr. Gilbert Jay Feldman; daughter Melissa Feldman, of Manhattan; son John Harris Feldman and daughter-in-law Terri Behrens Feldman; grandchildren Tiarr Behrens Dahlen and Merrik Dahlen, all of St. Paul, Minnesota. The family asks donations be made to Cove Animal Rescue, Glen Cove, NY. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FELDMAN, ELAINE KRAM
